org.junit.Test.None extends Throwable?!

java.lang.Object
   extended by java.lang.Throwable
       extended by org.junit.Test.None

This is extremely surprising. Maybe there's a good reason, and I'm 
really curious to hear what it is. However this is very weird. Normal 
classes extend Exception or Error. Can you please explain what's going 
on here?

--
